name: bicycle
description: A simple profile which routes a normal bicycle

fastest.description: The fastest route to your destination

shortest.description: The shortest route, independent of of speed

safety.description: A defensive route shying away from big roads with lots of cars

comfort.description: A comfortable route preferring well-paved roads, smaller roads and a bit of scenery at the cost of speed

comfort_safety.description: A route which aims to be both safe and comfortable at the cost of speed

node_networks.description: A route which prefers cycling over cycling node networks. Non-network parts prefer some comfort and safety. The on-network-part is considered flat (meaning that only distance on the node network counts)
